title: slow on cpu
body:
When I start the training of the network it hangs after initialization. I have already successfully tracked the paws of a mouse using this setup. I am now tracking four points (close together) around the eye of a mouse (150 labeled images). 

Setup: Ubuntu 16.04, CUDA 8.0 CuDNN 5.1

It gives this output and then does nothing. When I do exactly the same steps on my other training set it does work.

I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:135] successfully opened CUDA library libcublas.so.8.0 locally
